definitions: the action of paying close attention to something

examples.text: half the children who ate the cereal showed no improvement in attentiveness
the past scenes are beautifully handled, with a clear attentiveness to detail

definitions: the action of assiduously attending to the comfort or wishes of others; politeness or courtesy

examples.text: this sight has maintained its top grading due to the attentiveness of the staff
Mary was particularly touched by Georgiana's attentiveness to her during her recovery

shortDefinitions: act of assiduously attending to comfort or wishes of others
